glsa.title: SystemTap: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in SystemTap could allow a local attacker to create a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: SystemTap is a kernel profiling and instrumentation tool.

description.p: SystemTap does not properly handle DWARF expressions when unwinding the stack.

impact.p: A local attacker with SystemTap permissions could trigger a kernel panic, causing a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: Disabling unprivileged mode is a temporary workaround for this vulnerability.

resolution.p: All SystemTap users should upgrade to the latest version:
